text:
@realDonaldTrump You are taking temperatures of arriving passengers, who may be asymptomatic. 

That's not "precise". 

Precise would be requiring a neg COVID19 test before boarding the plane. 

I mean, I'm sure you ordered 50 million tests back in January when you are on top of things right? https://t.co/S5IkCarTGW
